entries.name: new(ole_type,  method) → WIN32OLE_METHOD objectclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new WIN32OLE_METHOD object which represents the information about OLE method. The first argument ole_type specifies WIN32OLE_TYPE object. The second argument method specifies OLE method name defined OLE class which represents WIN32OLE_TYPE object.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#dispidclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns dispatch ID.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#event?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if the method is event.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#event_interfaceclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns event interface name if the method is event.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#helpcontextclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns help context.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#helpfileclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns help file. If help file is not found, then the method returns nil.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#helpstringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns help string of OLE method. If the help string is not found, then the method returns nil.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#inspect → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the method name with class name.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_MTHOD#invkindclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the method invoke kind.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#invoke_kindclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the method kind string. The string is “UNKNOWN” or “PROPERTY” or “PROPERTY” or “PROPERTYGET” or “PROPERTYPUT” or “PROPERTYPPUTREF” or “FUNC”.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#nameclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the name of the method.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#offset_vtblclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the offset ov VTBL.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#paramsclick to toggle source
entries.desc: returns array of WIN32OLE_PARAM object corresponding with method parameters.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#return_typeclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns string of return value type of method.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#return_type_detailclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns detail information of return value type of method. The information is array.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#return_vtypeclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns number of return value type of method.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#size_opt_paramsclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the size of optional parameters.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#size_paramsclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the size of arguments of the method.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_METHOD#visible?click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if the method is public.

entries.name: to_s()
entries.desc: Alias for: name
